name: CodeDeployDeploymentGroupDeploymentRevisionGitHubLocation
description: GitHubLocation is a property of the AWS CodeDeploy DeploymentGroup Deployment Revision property that specifies the location of an application revision that is stored in GitHub.

properties.name: CommitId
properties.description: The SHA1 commit ID of the GitHub commit to use as your application revision.

properties.name: Repository
properties.description: The GitHub account and repository name that includes the application revision. Specify the value as account/repository_name.
